scripts.build: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type space --indent-width 2 --linefeed lf --include-path include --precision 0 --output target/build src/scss
scripts.postcss: npx postcss target/build/**/*.css --no-map --use autoprefixer --use cssnano --base target/build --dir target/
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run build -- --watch
scripts.github-build: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run postcss
